subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the past five Red Sox five games going into their weekend series at Texas, Boston’s only winning pitchers were Kason Gabbard and Julián Tavárez, and Gabbard is back in the minors.
snippet: In the past five Red Sox five games going into their weekend series at Texas, Boston’s only winning pitchers were Kason Gabbard and Julián Tavárez, and Gabbard is back in the minors.
